<strong>Why Ellipsis Node?</strong> In business for ~2 years and no negative reviews. Why not?  

<strong>Where is it hosted?</strong> Beauharnois via OVH.  

<strong>Can I see a site in action?</strong> <a href="http://img.co.at/image/UM">http://img.co.at/image/UM</a>  

<strong>DDoS protection?</strong> OVH's <a href="http://www.ovh.com/ca/en/anti-ddos/">anti-DDoS mitigation</a>.  
  
<strong>How does it work?</strong> In the event of an attack, OVH 'vacuums up' belligerent traffic into its mitigation infrastructure, absorbing it entirely, while simultaneously allowing for non-offensive connections to carry on as if nothing had happened.  

<strong>Will you make backups of my website?</strong> Backups are taken nightly and internally (as in sent to a different server but not to an extraneous provider).  

<strong>Can I get my own IP?</strong> Dedicated IP addresses are $1 per month or $11 per year.  

<strong>Payment gateways?</strong> PayPal, BitPay and 2Checkout. There is a <a href="http://ellipsisno.de/terms/#gateways">$1 processing fee</a> if you pay with a credit card.

<strong>Money back guarantee?</strong> 30 days.  

<strong>Further inquiries?</strong> PM or sales@ellipsisno.de. Custom plans and subscriptions are available. Thanks for your consideration.
